channel.title: The Dev Blog on Modern survey data analysis
channel.description: Recent content in The Dev Blog on Modern survey data analysis

item.title: Making Graphs Look Easy with ggplot2 and Tidy Evaluation
Using Selenium with Docker for Consistent Testing
item.description: "Nightwatchrun", our new open-source tool, eliminates the "works on my machine" problem for automated end-to-end browser testing. Ensure that everyone's machine has the same configuration using Docker.

item.title: Developers As Users
item.description: Building software for a specific target audience can be challenging, particularly when developers' intuitions are very different from those of that audience. At a recent all-hands meeting, we exploited a unique opportunity to turn our developers into legitimate users of our product.

item.title: Using Travis-CI to Build Static Sites
item.description: Life is short. Here are seven tips to help you automate your static-site building so that you can focus on more important things.
